titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Quinn Chapel African Methodist Episcopal Church (Flint, Mich.) collection

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

corpname.primary_name: Quinn Chapel African Methodist Episcopal Church (Flint, Mich.)

did.unittitle: Quinn Chapel African Methodist Episcopal Church (Flint, Mich.) collection

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Church organized in 1875 in Flint, Michigan; named in memory of William Paul Quinn, fourth bishop of the A.M.E. Church.
archdesc.scopecontent: Anniversary brochures, 2000, 2008, and 2010; also scanned photographs of historic marker in front of contemporary church facility; also scanned photographs of previous buildings and of church pastors and early members.

corpname.primary_name: Quinn Chapel African Methodist Episcopal Church (Flint, Mich.)
